title: RANKED DEMOTION PROCESS SHOULD BE LOOKED @@
body:
The process of being demoted in ranked should be revisited!
> Promotion::: win three games in a row to progress - Demotion::: lose a few games on 0LP and you're out.
**Suggestion: introduce the chance to play three games to STAY in the league, rather than being demoted unannounced **

It would give the players that deserve to stay in the league a chance to rally the troops and get them through a demotion series,
and filter through the n00bs that fluke getting into a certain rank.

Thanks for listening <3 


_PS star guardian new horizon announcer voice is annoying af_

replies.body: As per the chat popup when you start a game, you can turn off the star guardian announcer VO in settings.

your negitive winrate overall for the season 47% and 44% winrate in the last 20 ranked games you've played. 

the system is placing you where you need to be.
if you have a positive winrate at 0LP you tend to get 1-2 matches at 0LP to give you a chance to recover. 


I think the ranked system is okay in this regard. 

if i may offer a solid piece of advice?

Dont focus on your LP or where you are at present. it just creates a sense of urgency when you are playing

lets say you are on 0/LP and you've noted this.. then you don't get your role. instead you are placed in a role you are not that strong in, the negative seed is placed. and when something goes wrong in the game. that's what will tilt you.

focus on improving, and keep a positive mindset.

i started this season exactly where you are, i'm now s3 and hoping to get to gold "fingers crossed" (if i dont get i'm still happy how i went this season)

**I wish you the best of luck**
